sentence.Network_en: It uses Hittite MMIC and microstrip circuit to realize RF module in distance measurement radar.
sentence.Network_cn: 采用Hittite公司MMIC元器件和微带电路,实现了测距雷达射频系统的功能.

sentence.Network_en: Towering genius disdains a beaten path . It'seeks regions hittite unexplored.
sentence.Network_cn: 卓越的天才不屑走旁人走过的路,他寻找迄今未开拓的地区.

sentence.Network_en: Then you shall say, Your servant Uriah the Hittite is also dead.
sentence.Network_cn: 你就说, 你的仆人赫人乌利亚也死了.

list.abs: kosak , the hittites and the greeks ., 赫梯人与希腊人.
hittite welding bellows co. , ltd ., 希泰焊接波纹管有限公司.
life and society in the hittite world ., 赫梯人的生活和社会.
原来这里也是古代赫人帝国(Hittite Empire)的首都。他们找到大批泥,版上写有五、六种文字,大部分是赫人的语文,以楔形文字写成,后来 …
这里面最特殊的一样文物是西台帝国(HITTITE EMPIRE)与埃及拉美西斯二世战争后所签定的和平协定，这个协定是刻在石版上面再用 …

means.word_mean: 1. a member of an ancient people who inhabited Anatolia and northern Syria about 2000 to 1200 BC
2. the language of the Hittites and the principal language of the Anatolian group of languages; deciphered from cuneiform inscriptions
1. of or relating to the Hittite people or their language or culture
